Noob here going to empty OCBC 360 on 1 Jan for resetting purpose; need to keep min bal 3k inside ? When salary comes in for Jan  need to transfer out as per normal ?
Assume you have 100k inside  withdraw 100k on Jan 1 will be counted as Jan 2 due to public holiday. Even if you clear ur balance  your MAB for Jan 25 is 3225$ so above 3k req.
So withdraw Jan's salary once it's in to have MAB for Jan 25 remaining at 3225$ ?
Hi all. May i know which is the best platform to buy S&P 500? Like a fixed amount every month.
Hi  for voluntarily cpf contribution +tax relief. Based on cris video  top up MA first to reach BRS will help supercharge SA and hit FRS earlier. But is there any benefit of hitting FRS earlier?
Depends on your strategy. Yeah do VCMA to reach BHS. This will help to supercharge and reach BRS and FRS. BHS and BRS are different.
Sorry  Typo. Yes VCMA to reach BHS then help supercharge SA to reach FRS earlier. But is there a benefit of hitting FRS earlier? For example hitting FRS at age of 40 versus 50?
Compound interest but having said that you lose a way to reduce income tax subsequently
what is the benefit of having it compound above the FRS (eg reach frs faster) if we can't withdraw the excess interest and the top-up amount after age 55?
